        Returns:

      • undoDraw

        public boolean undoDraw(int draw,
                        int penalty)
        for each player it search cards and if a needed draw card found we pass and do nothing bot if a draw card has not been found we add cards in number of draw to player cards and return false
        Parameters:
        draw - number of draw +2 or +4
        penalty - number of penalty for example penalty 1 means 1 * draw card
        Returns:
        true if draw card has not been undo

      • drawMove

        public void drawMove(int draw,
                     int penalty)
        this method randomly add penalty * draw number of cards to player cards
        Parameters:
        draw - number of draw +2 or +4
        penalty - number of times that draw card has been passed
